title: Businessweek Talks with Verishop CEO Imran Khan
itunes:title: Businessweek Talks with Verishop CEO Imran Khan
description:
Imran Khan, co-founder and CEO of e-commerce company Verishop, discusses WeWork’s aborted initial public offering and his outlook for the ecommerce industry. He speaks with Bloomberg Businessweek anchors Jason Kelly and Carol Massar from the Sooner Than You Think conference in Brooklyn.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
